participant_1.name: Lila Brooks
participant_1.personality: Passionate and creative, Lila pours her heart into her music.
participant_1.background: i am a country music singer. my favorite band is rascal flats. we spent summers ring at national parks. i started playing guitar when i was three. i grew up in the industry.

participant_2.name: Ethan Carter
participant_2.personality: Disciplined and determined, Ethan values loyalty and hard work.
participant_2.background: i live in canada. i didn't graduate high school. i'm in the army. my grandfather served in world war a. my favourite food is shawarma.
